text: Capistrano Francisco Heim (21 January 1934 - 24 September 2020) was an American-born Brazilian Roman Catholic bishop. Heim was born in Catskill, New York. He was ordained to the priesthood in 1965. He was bishop of the Roman Catholic Territorial Prelature of Itaituba, Brazil from 1988 until 2010.Diocese of Itaituba Heim died in New York City on 24 September 2020, aged 86.Bishop Capistrano Francisco Heim ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Brazilian Roman Catholic bishops Category:People from New York City Category:People from Par√°
title: Capistrano Francisco Heim
